data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Compensation ledger context fields that reference staffing assignment/time segment". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
